class media_manager.plugins.iconizer.utils.iconizers.NautilusNemoIconizer.NautilusNemoIconizer[source]¶

Bases: object

Class that iconizes folders for the Nemo and/or Nautilus file browsers

static iconize(directory, icon)[source]¶

Iconizes the folder :param icon: the icon to be used :param directory: the directory to be iconized :return: void
